items.sentence: You should\'ve told Tom that a long time ago.
You shouldn\'t eat just before you go to bed.
I suspect that Tom shouldn\'t have done that.
I don\'t think Tom likes hanging out with us.
I don\'t think Tom will ever stop doing that.
I don\'t think that Tom will be in Australia.
I don\'t think that Tom would like Australia.
Why didn\'t you bring your wife to the party?
The problem is that Tom isn\'t a good driver.
I used to have a girlfriend, but we broke up.
I used to play volleyball when I was younger.
I caught a cab from the station to the hotel.
Tom took out his flashlight and turned it on.
Tom translated the letter into French for me.
Tom tried to tell Mary what she needed to do.
I\'m reading the novel you gave me last week.
I\'m sure Tom will like the gift you got him.
I\'m sure everything will work out just fine.
Tom grows tomatoes and lettuce in his garden.
Tom had absolutely no idea what was going on.
